text: Ricardo Chibanga (Lourenço Marques, 8 November 1942 — Golegã, 16 April 2019) was a Mozambican bullfighter and the first black African bullfighter. ==References== Category:Mozambican bullfighters Category:Mozambican emigrants to Portugal Category:Sportspeople from Maputo Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Ricardo Chibanga
